meanings.definition: A game played by two people on a board with pieces moved according to the throw of dice.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we enjoyed playing backgammons with the colorful pieces and dice.
meanings.sent2: Backgammons is a classic board game that requires strategy and luck with the dice rolls.
meanings.sent3: The backgammons set looked so inviting that even the cat tried to play with the pieces!
meanings.sent4: In the world of board games, backgammons stands out for its blend of luck and skill.
meanings.sent5: The sound of dice rolling in backgammons always brings back fond memories of playing with friends.

meanings.definition: To win at backgammon by removing all of one's pieces from the board before the opponent.
meanings.sent1: She backgammons skillfully, always managing to clear her pieces off the board before anyone else.
meanings.sent2: He backgammons quickly, leaving his opponent with no chance to catch up and win.
meanings.sent3: The way she backgammons is like watching a master artist complete a masterpiece in record time.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, sometimes we need to backgammons our troubles away to move forward.
meanings.sent5: With determination and focus, he backgammons his way to victory in every match.
